definition: lit. the toad wants to eat swan meat (idiom)/fig. to try to punch above one's weight
pinyin: lai4 ha2 ma5 xiang3 chi1 tian1 e2 rou4

sentences.english: A toad hankering for a taste of swan .
Toads and snakes are repulsive to many people.
sentences.chinese: 许多人觉得瘌蛤蟆和蛇可憎。

sentences.english: Whether you believe it or not, the wane is always eaten by the toad.
sentences.chinese: 不管你相不相信，天鹅肉常常就是被癞蛤蟆吃掉的。

sentences.english: Several gold coins left the Toad's pocket and disappeared into the washerwoman 's purse.
sentences.chinese: 几个金币离开蛤蟆的口袋消失在洗衣婆的钱包里。

sentences.english: God, and toad, dozens of other homes whip, flooding.
sentences.chinese: 神定，捉蛤蟆，鞭数十，驱之别院。

sentences.english: He's like a toad trying to swallow a swan.
sentences.chinese: 他真是癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉。

sentences.english: It seemed to him that he beheld a humming-bird in the midst of toads .
sentences.chinese: 他好象在癞蛤蟆群里见到一只蜂鸟。

sentences.english: He is like a toad trying to swallow a swan.
sentences.chinese: 他像只癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉。

sentences.english: It came from the toad which the girl had cared for with such kindness.
sentences.chinese: 它来自小女孩蛤蟆赐顾帮衬如许地仁慈。

sentences.english: At least our kisses didn't turn them into toads.
sentences.chinese: 还好，至少我们的吻没把他们变成癞蛤蟆。

sentences.english: In through the broken window-pane hopped a big toad, oh! such an ugly big toad.
sentences.chinese: 一只大癞蛤蟆从破窗格子里跳了进来。

sentences.english: She had not seen the ugly big toad yet, nor her ugly son.
sentences.chinese: 她还从没见过这两只丑癞蛤蟆啊。

sentences.english: I am missing my toad girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我想念我癞蛤蟆小女朋友。

sentences.english: He thanked the toad and climbed back out.
sentences.chinese: 他向蛤蟆道声谢，就爬出来了。

sentences.english: Look, above is a toad opening its mouth to eat a swan.
sentences.chinese: 上面有一只懒蛤蟆，它张大嘴巴想吃天鹅肉。

sentences.english: The fat toad gave him a hollowed out yellow turnip, to which were harnessed six little mice.
sentences.chinese: 肥蛤蟆交给他一个空心的萝卜，上面套着六只小老鼠。

definition: Ox-Head, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
tortoise/cuckold/(old) male owner of a brothel/pimp
